about_the_game:
About this game.
Aberrant Nights is a first-person psychological horror game. The protagonist will travel to a suburban gas station in the middle of the night to become a part-time night shift employee at the gas station. However, suddenly one day, the protagonist's part-time life is shattered and various mysteries surface in this gas station. The clerk who speaks strangely and the strange work log all seem to be hiding an ulterior motive. What ever happened to this gas station? What is it trying to do to me?

[Caution]
This game contains sudden scares, a small amount of gore, flashing lights and loud noises. It is not suitable for players with heart disease, high blood pressure or photosensitive epilepsy.
Photosensitive epilepsy is a disease in which seizures may be caused by visual stimuli such as strong stimuli or flash stimuli. People with this disease may suffer from neural spasms such as loss of consciousness and muscle rigidity triggered by flashes of light, etc., which can be life-threatening. If you feel unwell during the game, please stop playing immediately and go to the hospital for examination if necessary.
The plot of this game is purely fictional, please do not imitate.

[Game Background]
The protagonist is a college girl on summer vacation who chooses to go looking for part-time jobs in order to earn money for her living. By chance, she found out that a local gas station not very far from her home was hiring. So, she sent in her resume, who knows things are not that simple ....

[Game Features]
Realistic game graphics, linear game plot, multiple ending settings.
There will be three different endings for you to explore, what is the fate of the protagonist? It's in your hands.
The game will tell a suspenseful urban legend story, the story content close to life, a strong sense of immersion.

The game lasts about 1.5-3 hours and has three different endings.
The game is localized in Chinese (text and voice), English (text), and Japanese (text).

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
